Enuka Vanessa Okuma / / ɛ ˈ n uːkə oʊ ˈkuː mə / ; amuru Septemba 20, 1976) bu onye ome ihe nkiri Canada, onye amara amara maka oru ya dika onye nleba anya Traci Nash na usoro ihe nkiri ndi uwe ojii Global / ABC, Rookie Blue (2010 – 2015)
A makwaara Okuma maka ọrụ ya na usoro ihe onyonyo Canada bụ Madison (1994 ruo 1998) na Sue Thomas: F.B Eye (2002–2005)
Ọ pụtara na oge mbụ nke Soap opera nke onyonyo bụ Hillside dị ka kelly onye bu onye na-akpa nkata na agbam izu
A mụrụ Okuma na Vancouver, British Columbia
O sitere na Naijiria, sikwa n'agbụru ndị Igbo
N'afọ 1990, ọ malitere ọrụ ya na ihe onyonyo, n'egosipụtapụta dị ka onye ngosipụta n'ihe nkiri oge niile n'oge mbụ nke Soap oper ndị  ntorobịa, bụ Hillside
N'ime 1990s, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado n'ọtụtụ emere maka ihe nkiri telivishọn na usoro telivishọn Canada, dị ka Madison
O mechara mee ihe nkiri mpụta mbụ ya na ọrụ nkwado na Double Jeopardy (1999).
Okuma so jikọọ aka na usoro ihe nkiri gbasara mpụ nke America Sue Thomas: F.B Eye￼￼ site na 2002 ruo 2005
Ọ gosiputara dị ka ọbịa  na usoro ihe onyonyo hit nke bụ usoro dị iche iche, gụnyere Dark Angel, Odyssey 5, Cold Case, Grey's Anatomi na NCIS: Los Angeles
O nwere ọrụ ọtụtụ ugboro ugboro dị ka Marika Donoso na oge nke asaa nke usoro Fox 24
N'afọ 2010, Okuma malitere  ịgosiputa na usoro ihe nkiri ndị uwe ojii Global / ABC, Rookie Blue dị ka onye nchọpụta Traci Nash
Mgbe a gbara ajụjụ ọnụ maka otu o siri nweta ọrụ ya na Rookie Blue, Okuma kwuru:
E merem n'onwem mwale ihe omume nkiri maka akụkụ Gail [nke Charlotte Sullivan gosiputara] na Charlotte mere mwale ihe omume nkiri dị ka Traci

Mgbe anyị nwetara nkesa akparamagwa akụkụ ahụ, m kwuru, "Echere m na m gaara egosiputa  Traci" ma Charlotte kwuru, "Echere m na m gaara egosiputa dị ka Gail." Obi dị m ụtọ, ndị na-emepụta ihe chere otu ihe ahụ
E deputara Okuma dị ka otu n'ime ndị ngosipụta akparamagwa ndú na ABC pilot,bụ The Adversaries,  na 2015
N'afọ ahụ, ọ bụkwa onye ọbịa gosiputara dị ka Nia Lahey na usoro ọkụ n'ọnụ bụ How to Get Away with Murder
Okuma wepụtara olu Lady Une na English dub nke Mobile Suit Gundam Wing, Jade na usoro ihe nkiri Canada Shadow Raiders, ma kwupụtakwara gem fusion Rhodonite na Steven Universe
O nyere olu maka agwa Tau Idair na egwuregwu, Star Wars: The Old Republic
Okuma mere mpụta mbụ nke iduzi ya na obere ihe nkiri, cookie, nke ọ bụkwa onye edemede, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye isi mmepụta ihe
Okuma so dee ihe omume "nwoke Kachasị Mma" na Rookie Blue

For her role in Madison, she was nominated for Best Performance in a Children's or Youth Program or Series at the 1995 Gemini awards. The following year, also for Madison, she was nominated for Best Performance by an Actress in a Continuing Leading Dramatic Role.
Okuma meriri ihe nrite Women In Film na 1999 Vancouver International Film Festival maka ọrụ ya na Daydrift

Maka ọrụ ya na Rookie Blue, a họpụtara Okuma maka ịrụ ọrụ kacha mma site n'aka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ọrụ nkwado egosipụtara na usoro ihe nkiri na onyinye 2011nke Gemini Award  na ihe    Canadian screen Award maka arụmọrụ kacha mma site n'aka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ọrụ nkwado egosipụtara na Mmemme ma ọ bụ usoro dị egwu na 2013
Na July 2, 2011, ọ lụrụ onye na-akụ egwu Joe Gasparik na Toronto, obodo ebe mbụ ha zutere mgbe ha na-arụ ọrụ na ihe ngosi telivishọn ọnụ
Gasparik riọro Okuma nkwe ọlụlụ mgbe okuma nọ n'akụkụ osimiri dị na Vancouver ka afọ atọ gachara ha kpara
